Posts.EditableText: I often wondered why people on the forum would ask me what my email address was... then I realised that nobody else could see it, due to a phpBB setting. So I've now turned on the ability to display email addresses. You can hide yours from the User Control Panel at the top of the screen if you like. Also, I've turned off the ability to PM me as I don't really need a separate inbox - if you need to contact me directly, please email me at alex@textadventures.co.uk - this email address should now appear to the left of my posts too! You can control your own PM setting also from the User Control Panel.
